Groups.Group: Red Hat Software Collections 1 for RHEL 6
Red Hat Software Collections 1 for RHEL 7

Arg.V:
#!/bin/bash
function updatepk() { if [ ! -z $1 ]; then if [ -e /var/run/yum.pid ];then exit 10 fi result=`yum -y update $1 2>&1` status=$? commandexist=`echo $result | grep -E "yum: command not found"` if [ "$commandexist" != "" ]; then exit 8 fi
commandexist=`echo $result | grep -E "yum: No such file or directory"` if [ "$commandexist" != "" ]; then exit 8 fi
islock=`echo $result | grep -E "lock /var/run/yum.pid"`
if [ "$islock" != "" ]; then exit 10 fi
islock=`echo $result | grep -E "/var/run/yum.pid: another copy is running"`
if [ "$islock" != "" ]; then exit 10 fi
isnotconnected=`echo $result | grep -E "There was an error communicating with RHN"` if [ "$isnotconnected" != "" ]; then exit 9 fi
isnotconnected=`echo $result | grep -E "This system is not registered with RHN"` if [ "$isnotconnected" != "" ]; then exit 9 fi
isnotconnected=`echo $result | grep -E "No Repositories Available to Set Up"` if [ "$isnotconnected" != "" ]; then exit 9 fi isnotconnected=`echo $result | grep -E "Error Class Code: 9 Error Class Info: Invalid System Credentials"` if [ "$isnotconnected" != "" ]; then exit 9 fi isscriptletfailed=`echo $result | grep -E "error:" | grep -E "scriptlet failed, exit status 255"` if [ "$isscriptletfailed" != "" ]; then exit 6 fi if [ $status -ne 0 ];then exit 7 fi fi } updatepk devtoolset-3-elfutils
exit 0

exit 0

Vulnerability.Title: devtoolset-3-elfutils bug fix and enhancement update
Vulnerability.Description:
Updated devtoolset-3-elfutils packages that fix several bugs and add various enhancements are now available for Red Hat Developer Toolset 3.1. The elfutils packages contain a number of utility programs and libraries related to the creation and maintenance of executable code. The devtoolset-3-elfutils packages provide the Red Hat Developer Toolset version of elfutils.
The devtoolset-3-elfutils packages have been upgraded to upstream version 0.161, which provides a number of bug fixes and enhancements over the previous version. Among others:
* The following changes have been introduced in the libdw library: The "dwarf_cu_getdwarf" and "dwarf_cu_die" functions have been added; the non-existing "DW_TAG_mutable_type" attribute has been removed from the dwarf.h header file; libdw now supports handling LZMA-compressed kernel modules (.ko.xz).
* The eu-unstrip utility has a new option, "-F" or "--force", for combining files with non-matching ELF headers.
* Support for the ELF v2 application binary interface on Red Hat Enterprise Linux for POWER (little endian) has been added.
(BZ#1163979)
Users of devtoolset-3-elfutils are advised to upgrade to these updated packages, which fix these bugs and add these enhancements.
Note for remediation: Please disable the SELinux for RHEL 4/5 when repairing, or some rpm packages will fail to install.
